header-shipping-text: FREE SHIPPING ON ORDER OFF $100, USE CODE: SHOPIER Details
footer-copyright-text: Theshopier© 2015 powered by Wordpress ™. All rights reserved
color_xml_editor:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<colour>
	<item>
		<title>Header Top Background</title>
		<id>header-top-bg</id>
		<subtitle>Header Top Background</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#ffffff</def>
		<output>		
			<bgcolor>
			header .nth_header_top			
			</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Header Top Color</title>
		<id>header-top-bg-color-1</id>
		<subtitle>Header on Home Page</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#3d3d3d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
			header .nth_header_top,
			header .nth_header_top a
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
			
			</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Header background</title>
		<id>header-bg-color</id>
		<subtitle> Header background color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#12294d</def>
		<output>
			<color>header#header .nth-menu-wrapper ul.menu > li.btn > a</color>
			<bgcolor>
			header#header
			</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Header color</title>
		<id>header-text-color</id>
		<subtitle> Header text color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fff</def>
		<output>
			<color>
			header#header .nth-menu-wrapper ul.menu > li > a,
			.pc-menu > .menu > li.menu-item-has-children > .menu-drop-icon
			
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
			
			</bgcolor>
		</output>
	</item>

	<item>
		<title>Body</title>
		<id>body-color-section-start</id>
		<subtitle>The header top colour</subtitle>
		<type>section</type>
		<indent>true</indent>
	</item>	
	
	<item>
		<title>First color</title>
		<id>color-1</id>
		<subtitle> Text color, body text color </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#3d3d3d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				body,
				h1, 
				h2, 
				h3, 
				h4, 
				h5,
				h1.page-title,
				a, 
				p.lost_password a:hover,
				html .wpb_accordion .wpb_accordion_wrapper .wpb_accordion_section .wpb_accordion_header a,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a:hover, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a:hover,
				footer, #footer,
				.mini_cart_item .product-detail .product-title,
				.heading-title,
				.heading-title.border-bottom-solid
			</color>
			<bgcolor></bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Second color</title>
		<id>color-2</id>
		<subtitle>  Title, Heading </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#12294d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a,							 
				a.button.button-border:hover,				
				.pc-menu.vertical-menu-inner > ul.menu > li > .sub-menu li.menu-item > a,
				.nth-shortcode.recent-comments ul > li h3 a:hover,				
				.nth-quickshop-wrapper div.product .product_title, 
				.woocommerce-page div.product .product_title,
				.nth-sidebar ul.widgets-sidebar > li .widget-heading h3,
				.nth-home-about-us-block-1 .aio-icon-header .aio-icon-title,
				.nth-home-heading-title-2,
				h3.post-title a, 
				h2.post-title a,
				.nth-tabs.round .tabs li.active a,
				.nth-tabs.round .tabs li:hover a,
				.nth-home-project .theshopier_woo_single_project h2,
				.nth-home-project .theshopier_woo_single_project
				
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
				.post-item.grid_style_3 .read-more .button
			</bgcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Third color</title>
		<id>color-3</id>
		<subtitle>  Title small, Text tabs </subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#8d8d8d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
			.wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li a, 
			del span.amount, 
			#footer .nth-product-categories-wrapper a,
			.heading-title.border-bottom-solid.color-light,
			.vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab > a,
			.nth-tabs.round .tabs li a
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
			.heading-title.border-bottom-solid
			</bdcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
		
	<item>
		<title>Fourth color</title>
		<id>color-4</id>
		<subtitle>Link, background</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#1d1d1d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				a:hover, 
				a:focus, 
				p.lost_password a,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a:hover, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner h3.product-title a:hover,
				.woocommerce .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a, 
				.woocommerce-page .products section.product .product-inner .product-cats a,
				a.button.button-border:hover,
				span.amount,										
				.wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li.ui-state-active a, 
				.wpb_tabs ul.wpb_tabs_nav.nth-boxed > li:hover a,
				.nth-shortcode .nth_products_categories_shortcode .shortcode-woo-tabs li.active a, 
				.nth-shortcode .nth_products_categories_shortcode .shortcode-woo-tabs li:hover a,
				html .wpb_accordion .wpb_accordion_wrapper .wpb_accordion_section .wpb_accordion_header.ui-accordion-header-active a,			
				#footer .nth-product-categories-wrapper a:hover,			
				.nth-shortcode.recent-comments ul > li h3 a,
				.nth-shortcode.nth-pricing ul.nth-pricing-ul li.desc,		
				.nth-quickshop-wrapper div.product .woocommerce-product-rating .star-rating + a, 
				.woocommerce-page div.product .woocommerce-product-rating .star-rating + a,
				.text-color1, 
				.nth-form-single .nth-form-wrapper [type=submit]:hover:before,
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover span.cart-total span.amount,
				.woocommerce .star-rating span:before, 
				.woocommerce .star-rating span:before, 
				.woocommerce .star-rating:before, 
				.woocommerce-page .star-rating span:before, 
				.woocommerce-page .star-rating span:before, 
				.woocommerce-page .star-rating:before,
				
				.vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab.vc_active > a,
				.vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab:hover > a
				
			</color>
			<bgcolor>
				.woocommerce .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a, 
				.woocommerce a.product_type_grouped, 
				.woocommerce a.product_type_external, 
				.woocommerce a.button.add_to_cart_button, 
				.woocommerce a.product_type_grouped, 
				.woocommerce a.product_type_external, 
				.woocommerce a.button.out_stock, 
				.woocommerce .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button, 
				.woocommerce-page .wishlist_table td.product-add-to-cart a, 
				.woocommerce-page a.product_type_grouped, 
				.woocommerce-page a.product_type_external, 
				.woocommerce-page a.button.out_stock, 
				.woocommerce-page a.button.add_to_cart_button, 
				.woocommerce-page .button.alt.single_add_to_cart_button,
				a.button, 
				button, 
				html input[type="button"], 
				input[type="reset"], 
				input[type="submit"], 
				.btn-primary,				
					
				header .nth-mini-popup .nth-shopping-hover .icon-nth-cart:after,
				.nth_header_toolbar .nth-shopping-cart-item span:after,
				.nth-sidebar ul.widgets-sidebar > li.widget_calendar #wp-calendar #today,				
				.nth-searchform .nth-search-wrapper [type=submit], 
				.nth_header_toolbar > div > div > a span:after,
				.prod_style_5 .product-inner .product_buttons .product_buttons_inner .add_to_cart_button
			</bgcolor>
			
			<bdcolor>
				a.button.button-border:hover, 
				.heading-title:after, 
				.heading-title.ud-line:after				
			</bdcolor>
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Fifth color</title>
		<id>color-5</id>
		<subtitle>Button hover, link hover</subtitle>

	<item>

	<item>
		<title>Seventh color</title>
		<id>color-7</id>
		<subtitle>"a" tag color.</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fd6282</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				ins span.amount,				
				.woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistaddedbrowse a, 
				.woocommerce .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistexistsbrowse a, 
				.woocommerce-page .yith-wcwl-add-to-wishlist .yith-wcwl-wishlistaddedbrowse a,

			</color>		
		</output>		
	</item>
	
	
	<item>
		<title>Eight color</title>
		<id>home-testmonials-color</id>
		<subtitle>Text color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fff</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.nth-shortcode.theshopier_testimonials .testimonials-item .description,
				.nth-shortcode.theshopier_testimonials .testimonials-item h3,
				.theshopier_testimonials .heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
				.nth-home-counter .heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
				.nth-home-project .heading-title.border-bottom-solid,
				.nth-team-members-wrapper.overlay-2 .team-member .info h3 a,
				.nth-team-members-wrapper.overlay-2 .team-member .info p,
				.post-item.grid_style_3 .read-more .button
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
				.nth-heading-line60 .heading-title.ud-line:after,
				.nth-home-project .heading-title.border-bottom-solid
			</bdcolor>			
		</output>
	</item>
	
	<item>
		<title>Footer text color 1</title>
		<id>footer-text-color-1</id>
		<subtitle>Footer text color</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#bababa</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.footer-1 p,
				.footer-1 li a
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
				header#header.header-14 + .main-content + footer li a:hover
			</bdcolor>
			
			
		</output>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Footer text color 2</title>
		<id>footer-text-color-2</id>
		<subtitle>Footer Heading</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#fff</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.footer-1 h3, .footer-1 .heading-title.border-bottom-solid, 
				.footer-1 .theshopier_tag_cloud a
			</color>
			<bdcolor>
				.footer-1 .heading-title.border-bottom-solid
			</bdcolor>
			
		</output>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Footer Copyright Background</title>
		<id>footer-copyright-bg-vbt</id>
		<subtitle>Footer Copyright Background</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#171717</def>
		<output>
			<bgcolor>
				.footer-copyright
			</bgcolor>		
		</output>
	</item>
	<item>
		<title>Footer Copyright Text</title>
		<id>footer-copyright-text-vbt</id>
		<subtitle>Footer Copyright Text</subtitle>
		<type>color</type>
		<def>#8d8d8d</def>
		<output>
			<color>
				.footer-copyright
			</color>		
		</output>
	</item>
	
</colour>
font_xml_editor:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?>
<fonts>
	<font>
		<title>Body Font</title>
		<id>body-font</id>
		<subtitle>body font subtitle</subtitle>
		<output>body</output>
		<def>
			<color>#5d5d5d</color>
			<size>16px</size>
			<line_height>1.55em</line_height>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Header Font</title>
		<id>header-font</id>
		<subtitle>Header font subtitle</subtitle>
		<google>1</google>
		<output>header, #header</output>
		<def>
			<size>13px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Navigation Font</title>
		<id>navigation-font</id>
		<subtitle>Navigation font subtitle</subtitle>
		<google>1</google>
		<output>header#header .nth-menu-wrapper ul.menu > li > a</output>
		<def>
			<size>13px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<text_transform>uppercase</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>
	
	<font>
		<title>Heading Home Font</title>
		<id>heading-home-font</id>
		<subtitle>heading home font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
		.heading-title-home,
		.theshopier_woo_single_project h2
		</output>
		<units>rem</units>
		<def>
			<color>#51c8eb</color>
			<size>5</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
		</def>
	</font>	
	<font>
		<title>Heading Font 1</title>
		<id>heading-font-1</id>
		<subtitle>heading font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>
		h1, h2, h3, h4, h5,
		.heading-title
		</output>
		<def>
			<color>#3d3d3d</color>
			<family>Poppins</family>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Heading Font 2</title>
		<id>heading-font-2</id>
		<subtitle>heading font 2 subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Playfair Display</default>
		<output>
			.nth-shortcode.theshopier_testimonials .testimonials-item .description,
			.nth-home-block em,
			.theshopier_woo_single_project .project-testimonial,
			.nth-team-members-wrapper.overlay-2 .team-member .info p
		</output>
		<def>
			<family>Playfair Display</family>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Heading Font 3</title>
		<id>heading-font-3</id>
		<subtitle>heading font border bottom solid subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Poppins</default>
		<output>.heading-title.border-bottom-solid</output>
		<def>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<size>20px</size>
			<family>Poppins</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Product Tab Font</title>
		<id>product-tab-font</id>
		<subtitle>Product tab font</subtitle>
		<default>Roboto Condensed</default>
		<output>
		.vc_tta-style-classic.vc_tta-tabs.vc_general.nth-tab-style4 .vc_tta-tab > a
		</output>
		<def>
			<size>16px</size>
			<family>Roboto Condensed</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<text_transform>uppercase</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>
	
	<font>
		<title>Footer Font</title>
		<id>footer-font</id>
		<subtitle>footer font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Roboto Condensed</default>
		<output>footer, #footer</output>
		<def>			
			<size>13px</size>
			<family>Roboto Condensed</family>
			<weight>400</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<line_height>13px</line_height>
		</def>
	</font>
	<font>
		<title>Footer Heading Font</title>
		<id>footer-heading-font</id>
		<subtitle>footer heading font subtitle</subtitle>
		<default>Roboto Condensed</default>
		<output>.footer-1 h3</output>
		<def>
			<size>16px</size>
			<family>Roboto Condensed</family>
			<weight>700</weight>
			<align>inherit</align>
			<text_transform>uppercase</text_transform>
		</def>
	</font>
</fonts>
